titles.title: To provide for the extension of nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of the Republic of Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/29/2000--Introduced. Authorizes the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (normal trade relations treatment) to the products of the Republic of Georgia.
